events.title: School Choice Application Window Open
events.notes:
CHOICE open application periods for school year 2026-2027 have changed from last year. There are open periods for Martin Luther School for each month from February through August.

  This program allows eligible students to attend the private school of their choice free of charge. Contact the school office today to find out about eligiblity requirements and to determine if there are options for your to qualify.

events.title: Ash Wednesday & Midweek Lenten Services
events.notes:
Midweek services for Lent begin on February 18th with Ash Wednesday. These special services take place at 3:15 & 6:00pm, every Wednesday through March 25th.

  The theme for the 2026 Lenten services is “It is Finished”. This series explores the prophecies of Zechariah, offering an enriching look at our Savior Jesus, particularly as these prophecies relate to the events of Jesus’ Holy Week passion, death, and resurrection.

Our midweek Lenten services also give us opportunity to hear from and meet some of the other pastors in our area. We look forward to welcoming them during Lent.

Note: Suppers will not be offered this year, neither after the 3:15 service or before the 6:00pm service

events.title: Men of His Word Conference
events.notes:
The Men of His Word Conference will be hosted at the Oshkosh Waterfront Hotel & Convention Center in Oshkosh on February 21, 2026. The theme is Courage Under Fire.

Register at menofhisword.org/registration.
